MSR.DESCRIPTION: Setting this will switch off the data cache. This setting should be disabled for best performance.
Setting this will switch off the instruction cache. This setting should be disabled for best performance.
Setting this will switch off the CPU branch prediction feature. This setting should be disabled for best performance.

MSR.WIDGETTEXT: Disable Stopping CPU clock in HLT state
MSR.DESCRIPTION: Whilst idle the CPU can halt the clock. This setting should be disabled for best performance.
